title: [娱乐|机制|汉化]Infernal Mobs——插件版的精英怪！让你生无可恋！[1.6-1.11]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:56 编辑 

废话不多说
作者的话【插件介绍】
怪物会随机成为“精英怪”，他们会得到一个随机属性，他们有特殊的名字，当他们死后会随机掉落物品。我看到Atomic Stryker的精英怪mod的时候，我就做了这么一个插件。模仿了性算是比较高的。
图片欣赏：

精英怪的属性：
毒性：使玩家中毒
装甲：给小怪全套钻石盔甲。
眩晕：让玩家失明。
凋谢：给玩家凋零的效果。
Tosser:Tosser the player around.
小偷:偷走玩家手上的物品。
缓慢：给玩家缓慢效果。
bullwark：Takes less damage.
生锈：减少玩家手上的东西的耐久度。
饥饿：给玩家饥饿的效果。
重生：有两条生命，会复活。
隐身：怪物有隐身效果。
末影：怪物会像末影人一样传送。
火球：发射火球。
Lifesteal：直接造成玩家伤害。
冲刺：超快的速度。
风暴：闪电来劈玩家。
Webber:在玩家脚下生成蜘蛛网。
复仇：类似于附魔“荆棘”。
虚弱：给玩家虚弱buff。
狂暴：Damages the player more, but takes damage from attacking.
爆炸：死亡后爆炸。
药水：投掷给玩家伤害药水。
乳腺癌：Has a slim chance to spawn three babies of its type.
莫尔滕：免疫火/岩浆，starts a fire on death and lights the player on fie.
弓箭手：超强的弓箭连发。
巫师：Shoots wither skulls.
Firework:Fireworks explode from mob when hit.
Gravity：让玩家飞起来！
飞：让自己可以飞。
骑乘：骑在另一个精英怪身上。
Morph:Can infrequently morph into another infernal mob.
Ghost：On death a ghost is spawned.
Confusing:Gives player the confusion effect.
【百度翻译+人工修正，真心不会= =】
物品：
插件中默认配置了一百多个战利品~你还可以在loot.yml里面新增自己的战利品~
指令：
/im help 查看插件帮助
/im reload   重载插件
/im info   查看插件信息
/im getloot <index>   给自己一个loot.yml里面的物品
/im cspawn <mob> <world> <x> <y> <z> <ability1> <ability2>  生成怪物在指定的世界的某一个地方
/im pspawn <mob> <player> <ability1> <ability2>  在指定的玩家旁边生成怪物
/im killall <world>  清除某个世界的精英怪
/im abilities 展示可用怪物属性
/im showAbilities 展示附近的怪物的属性
权限：
--------------------------------------------------------------

Permissions
Permission to use the commands:


--------------------------------------------------------------
作者你怎么不去死
已知不兼容的插件：
LeveledMobs v15.0
- mobarena v0.96.6
我都为我自己的英语担忧啊= =
config.yml
#Chance is the chance that a mob will not be infernal, the lower the number the higher the chance. (min 1)
#Enabledworlds are the worlds that infernal mobs can spawn in.
#Enabledmobs are the mobs that can become infernal.
#Loot is the items that are dropped when an infernal mob dies. (You can have up to 64)
#Item is the item, Amount is the amount, Durability is how damaged it will be (0 is undamaged).
#nameTagsLevel is the visibility level of the name tags, 0 = no tag, 
#1 = tag shown when your looking at the mob, 2 = tag always shown.
#Note, if you have name tags set to 0, on server restart all infernal mobs will turn normal.
#If you want to enable the boss bar you must have BarAPI on your server.
#nameTagsName and bossBarsName have these special tags: <mobLevel> = the amount of powers the boss has.
#<abilities> = A list of about 3-5 (whatever can fit) names of abilities the boss has.
#<mobName> = Name of the mob, so if the mob is a creeper the mobName will be "Creeper".
chance: 1
levelChance:
  '3': 1
  '4': 1
  '5': 1
  '6': 1
  '7': 1
namePrefix: '&f精英'
levelPrefixs:
  '3': '&f疯狂'
  '4': '&f狂暴'
  '5': '&f巨人'
  '6': '&f国王'
  '7': '&f精英'
nameTagsLevel: 1
nameTagsName: '&f<prefix> <mobName>'
bossBarsName: '&fLV. <mobLevel> &f<prefix> <mobName>'
enableBossBar: true
enableScoreBoard: true
showHealthOnScoreBoard: true
effectAllPlayerAttacks: true
enableFireParticles: true
enableDeathMessages: false
deathMessages:
- '&c有人杀死了一个精英怪！'
- '&c有个精英怪被玩家杀死了！'
- '&c有人驯服了一个精英怪！'
- '&cAn mob &cwas beheaded by player&c''s weapon!'
- '&c有人的暗器杀死了一个精英怪！'
- '&c有个精英怪被玩家的暗器杀死了！'
enableSpawnMessages: false
spawnMessageRadius: 64
spawnMessages:
- '&c有一个精英怪在你附近出生了！'
- '&c小心！'
- '&c一声尖叫…'
- '&c搞事情？！'
- '&c有一个精英怪潜伏在你附近…'
enabledworlds:
- <world_the_end>
- <sc>
- <world_nether>
enabledmobs:
- Chicken
- PigZombie
- Zombie
- Skeleton
- Spider
- CaveSpider
- Creeper
- Witch
- Enderman
- Pig
- Slime
- LavaSlime
- Wolf
- Ghast
- Giant
- SilverFish
- Blaze
- Squid
- WitherSkeleton
poisonous: true
armoured: true
blinding: true
withering: true
tosser: true
thief: true
quicksand: true
bullwark: true
rust: true
sapper: true
1up: true
cloaked: true
ender: true
ghastly: true
lifesteal: true
sprint: true
storm: true
webber: true
vengeance: true
weakness: true
berserk: true
explode: true
potions: true
mama: true
molten: true
archer: true
necromancer: true
firework: true
gravity: true
flying: true
mounted: true
morph: true
mamaSpawnAmount: 3
vengeanceDamage: 6
berserkDamage: 3
moltenBurnLength: 5
gravityLevitateLength: 6
horseMountsHaveSaddles: true
armouredMountsHaveArmour: true
fireworkColour:
  red: 255
  green: 10
  blue: 10
mobParticles:
- lavaSpark:1:10
mountFate: nothing
enabledMounts:
- Spider
- MushroomCow
- Cow
- Sheep
- Pig
- EntityHorse
- Slime
- Ghast
enabledRiders:
- PigZombie
- Skeleton
- Zombie
- Witch
- Creeper
- SnowMan
- Blaze
- Enderman
- WitherSkeleton
disabledBabyMobs:
- Wolf
- MushroomCow
- Cow
- Sheep
- Pig
- Chicken
- Ozelot
- EntityHorse
#The min/max amount of powers that a mob will get.
#NOTE: the amount of enabled powers must not be less than the maxpowers.
#healthMultiplier is what number the infernal mobs health will be multiplied by.
#If you have healthByPower enabled then healthMultiplier and healthByDistance will do nothing.
#dropChance is the chance a dead mob will drop loot, the lower the higher the chance (min 1)
#xpMultiplier is what the normal xp a mob drops will be multiplied by.
#healthByDistance makes mobs HP go up as you go further from the world spawn.
#Every addDistance blocks the mobs will get healthToAdd times how far they are HP.
minpowers: 3
maxpowers: 7
healthMultiplier: 4
healthByPower: false
healthByDistance: false
powerByDistance: false
healthToAdd: 5
addDistance: 200
powerToAdd: 1
enableDrops: true
dropChance: 1
xpMultiplier: 8
enableFarmingDrops: true
naturalSpawnHeight: 0复制代码
一般上需要更改的：
chance: 1 精英怪的生成几率（数值越小，几率越高）
enabledworlds:
- <world_the_end>
- <sc>
- <world_nether>
精英怪会在这些世界生成

replies.author: shuye_kun
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 shuye_kun 于 2016-12-24 23:38 编辑 

@18278436235 /im cspawn <mob> <world> <x> <y> <z> <ability1> <ability2>  生成怪物在指定的世界的某一个地方
/im pspawn <mob> <player> <ability1> <ability2>  在指定的玩家旁边生成怪物
/im killall <world>  清除某个世界的精英怪           /im abilities 展示可用怪物属性
/im showAbilities 展示附近的怪物的属性
